_audio_asr.summary: In the midst of a cluttered house, Grayson and Mike embark on a mission to salvage valuable items, from stained glass to a prized moose sign, while engaging in lighthearted banter about college experiences and plans for future adventures.

The show follows a group of characters as they navigate a series of quirky and unexpected events involving moving a heavy item, dealing with playful animals, and discovering valuable antiques. As they face challenges with teamwork and communication, they uncover hidden treasures and plan for future endeavors.
